section Section1;
shared CsvBrahmin = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://brahminstorage.blob.core.windows.net/caravan2/AuditLog.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = CsvBrahmin,
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(Source, each ([UserIds] = "mzurita@piconsulting.com.ar")),
  #"Filtered rows 1" = Table.SelectRows(#"Filtered rows", each ([Operations] <> "CreateDataset" and [Operations] <> "Import" and [Operations] <> "ViewDashboard"))
in
  #"Filtered rows 1";
